snippet.title: Absolute Value Equations - How to Solve (Learn Algebra 1)
snippet.description:
Learn how to solve absolute value equations in this free math video tutorial by Mario's Math Tutoring.  We discuss how to rewrite an absolute value equation into 2 separate equations and solve. This video is one of the free lessons out of the Learn Algebra 1 video course for sale.

0:09 Notation for Absolute Value and What it Represents 
0:37 Introductory Example Solve 3|x-4|+2=14 
2:12 Example 1 Solve |2x-3|=-2
2:38 Example 2 Solve |x+5|=3
3:45 Example 3 Solve -1|x-4|+2=-7
4:22 Example 4 Solve 5|x-10|-5=20
4:56 Example 5 Solve Absolute Deviation Equation Story(Word) Problem

Learn Algebra 1 Lesson by Lesson in my "Learn Algebra 1" video course for sale. 87 Lessons teaching you step by step Algebra 1.  Check out the 13 free lessons(1 from each chapter)
https://mariosmathtutoring.teachable.com/p/learn-algebra-1-video-course

* Organized List of My Video Lessons to Help You Raise Your Scores & Pass Your Class. Videos Arranged by Math Subject as well as by Chapter/Topic. (Bookmark the Link Below)
http://www.mariosmathtutoring.com/free-math-videos.html
